data.text: @MayorBowser @_DCHealth It's well past time to recognize natural immunity in your protocols and unmask the lowest risk cohort, our kids.

@MayorBowser Low means that it is safe for kids to take off the masks in school if their parents choose it for them.  Also, President Biden called for voluntary masking in schools in his SOTU address.

Please repeal your order forcing them to mask.  There is no justification for it.

@MayorBowser Why are DC's youngest children still required to mask outside? Please update guidance to make it clear to childcare centers that masking toddlers anytime but especially outside is not required. Follow the rest of the nation and #UnmaskOurKids #unmaskDCkids

@MayorBowser Either remove masks for our children or admit publicly why you are not - if @WTUTeacher wants to hold our kids hostage they should own it. Why are kids able to go maskless indoors with random strangers in restaurants etc. across DC but not with their classmates in school??
@MayorBowser Community level is low meaning children should be allowed to unmask if they choose. Please update your school guidance to align with the CDC.
@MayorBowser Unmask DCâ€™s kids. We are the last in the country. This is ridiculous.
@MayorBowser Coerced vaccination for professionals is wrong. After seeing the list of Pfizer side effects NO ONE has had informed consent.
@MayorBowser Low, that's great! No more masking college students!
